šum-ma <sup>gi</sup>[<sup>š</sup>MÁ] ša ma-hi-ir-tim <sup>giš</sup>MÁ ša mu-uq-qé-el-pí-tim im-ha-aṣ-ma uṭ-ṭe<sub>4</sub>-eb-bi be-el <sup>giš</sup>MÁ ša <sup>giš</sup>MÁ-šu ṭe<sub>4</sub>-bi-a-at mi-im-ma ša i-na <sup>giš</sup>MÁ-šu hal-qú i-na ma-har i-lim ú-ba-ar-ma ša ma-hi-ir-tim ša <sup>giš</sup>MÁ ša mu-uq-qé-el-pí-tim ú-ṭe<sub>4</sub>-eb-bu-ú <sup>giš</sup>MÁ-šu ù mi-im-ma-šu hal-qá-am i-ri-a-ab-šum
